price: Yεbεka akyerε wͻn sε: “Ɛnnε da yi Yεwerε bɛfri mo sεdeε mo werε firii sε mobɛhyia mu wͻ moda woi mu no. Mo fie ne Amanehunu gya no mu, na monni ͻboafoͻ,
arabic: وَقِيلَ ٱلۡيَوۡمَ نَنسَىٰكُمۡ كَمَا نَسِيتُمۡ لِقَآءَ يَوۡمِكُمۡ هَٰذَا وَمَأۡوَىٰكُمُ ٱلنَّارُ وَمَا لَكُم مِّن نَّٰصِرِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: waqīla al-yawma nansākum kamā nasītum liqāa yawmikum hādhā wamawākumu al-nāru wamā lakum min nāṣirīna
